content.subtext:
A whole host of big changes have happened, deeming NerdBot officially in its 1.0 status!
Let's take a look at them.

items.0: Redesigned changelog messages. All shiny and formatted.
items.1: Updated the crate/clam spawning. Smoother separation of server spawns and a timer, so they don't spawn too often. Completely spam-proof.
items.2: Begun storing data specific to a guild (server) separate from within the code, so it carries across bot restarts.
items.3: Clam messages now update like crates do, when clams are claimed. They also have their own score and leaderboard!
items.4: Added `clams` command. Now you can see how many clams you've collected!
